title: Call Logs
metaTitle: Call Logs - Monitor AI Agent Call History | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Access detailed call logs, monitor AI agent performance, analyze call patterns, and review conversation transcripts. Track success rates and quality metrics.
metaKeywords: call logs, call history, AI agent calls, call analytics, call transcripts, call recordings, performance metrics, conversation details
lede: Monitor and analyze call history, performance metrics, and conversation details.

sections.title: Call Log Management
sections.content:
View detailed records of all calls handled by your AI agents.

Available Data:

  • Call Duration: Start time, end time, and total duration
  • Caller Information: Phone number, location, caller ID
  • Agent Performance: Response times, success rates
  • Conversation Details: Full transcripts and recordings

sections.title: Call Analytics
sections.content:
Analyze call patterns and agent performance with built-in analytics.

  • Success Rates: Track conversion and completion rates
  • Call Patterns: Identify peak hours and trends
  • Quality Metrics: Monitor conversation quality scores
